title: 35: Father of Smartwatches, with Bill Geiser
description: Bill Geiser, who's worked on wearables from Microsoft Spot to Palm to Fossil to HP, talks to Gartenberg and Ritchie about the state of the modern wrist.
itunes:subtitle: Bill Geiser, who's worked on wearables from Microsoft Spot to Palm to Fossil to HP, talks to Gartenberg and Ritchie about the state of the modern wrist.
itunes:summary: Bill Geiser, who's worked on wearables from Microsoft Spot to Palm to Fossil to HP, talks to Gartenberg and Ritchie about the state of the modern wrist.
